original_text: So then, we should try to live in a way that brings peace. We should try to help each other so that we become stronger as God's people.
korean_text: 그러므로 우리가 화평의 일과 서로 덕을 세우는 일을 힘쓰나니

sentences.original_text: So then, we should try to live in a way
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리는 살아가는 방식을 노력해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: We should try to help each other
